tweet.text: 1971: National Security Adviser Henry Kissinger forsakes grammar for diplomacy in Beijing talks: “I don’t mind being accused of using bad grammar. It’s no problem.” https://t.co/zX0IvZRPPf #NationalGrammarDay #FRUS https://t.co/MgguzaEt2k
tweet.html: 1971: National Security Adviser Henry Kissinger forsakes grammar for diplomacy in Beijing talks: “I don’t mind being accused of using bad grammar. It’s no problem.” go.usa.gov/xn69x #NationalGrammarDay #FRUS
